Articles.Content:
Any one no the number of post you nedd to level up your post stats?

:w00t:

500+; Master Rocket Scientist

250-499; Sr. Spacecraft Engineer

100-249; Spacecraft Engineer

50-99; Rocketry Enthusiast

0-49; Bottle Rocketeer

Fair warning, do not post just to raise your post count. This is considered post spamming and can result in your post count being reset and/or getting banned. Read the forums rules carefully.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Fair warning, do not post just to raise your post count. This is considered post spamming and can result in your post count being reset and/or getting banned. Read the forums rules carefully.

What would actually be counted as \'Post Spamming\'? Would it be Out of Context posts with no relevance to the thread, or just a lack of the ability to merge posts?
